system.description: Murmur, the Lord of Illusions, revels in deceit and trickery. He grants his followers the ability to create major illusions. The spell does everything @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.items.Item.fo16cY7cZfTfl6oX]{Create Minor Illusion} does with the addition of the ability to create the illusion up to 6 cubic feet. If an illusion of a living creature is created, a [[/save resolve]] must be made to determine if it is real or fake.
